embed.description: Most champions arm themselves with swords or guns or magic or whatever, but Illaoi's bringing a freakin' god to the Rift. One of the new breed of juggernauts, she's a slow but impactful solo laner in any game, with tentacles that offer huge zone control once they worm their way into a game.

replies.body: (This is my first post btw) Hey! I love league of legends and I have a ton of great ideas I'd love to share with you! (even if I'm bronze 1) I actually had an idea similar to omega Squad teemo called "Operation Teemo" with similar recalls and exact same look! (I drew it in school on a piece of paper, and it looked EXACTLY like the splash art!) anyways, here's some ideas: Pool Party Illaoi! She had braids and sunglasses, her idol thing that she holds is a coconut with a straw (like pool party lee sin's q) and her tentacles are palm trees. Her q is a surfboard slam and her e makes the shadow look like water. Maybe her ult would make the ground inbetween the palm trees sand? idk. one more idea, Atlantean Vel'koz! He looks like an octopus, and his q is a bubble that bursts. when the rift in his w exposes, it's like a coral reef underneath the rift. his e would be a burst of water underneath the target, and his ult would be a jet stream of water! Thanks for reading this, if you did rito! I really appreciate it and hope to post more!
We thought it was a pretty good idea, too! ;D She's hitting PBE now!
I mean, there *will* be more skins, it's not out of the question. (Secretly hoping for this to happen.)
Will Illaoi be released in Patch 5.23 or 5.24? Need to know cause im saving 4800 ip to buy hecarim when Illaoi comes out :D
were you part of the team for her?
I was QA on Void Bringer Illaoi. ^-^
nice work on the titanic women
We need a full chef team :3

Hey Riot can we have this as a skin concept for her: Elderwood Illaoi she'd have a similar color scheme to Elderwood Bard{{champion:432}} , then the tentacles are giant gnarled tree roots coming out of the walls.
i would love to see this
When I see her tentacles I think of robot arms in a manufacturing plant or something, so maybe something like that.

One. That would be Awesome. Second: It's gonna greenlight the CD Rule. Third. Going with with second point is that she would not be a mother.

I am being vague here.
